ValidationRule.description: Cannot create a schedule item in the month prior to the membership contract's Start Date.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: Date__c < Membership_Contract__r.Start_Date__c && MONTH(Date__c) <> MONTH(Membership_Contract__r.Start_Date__c) && $User.Id <> '00530000003A32O' /*Paul Harney*/ && $User.Id <> '0055Y00000I0fox' /*Jennifer Brenner*/ && Income__c <> 0
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Cannot create a schedule item in the month prior to the membership contract's Start Date.
